transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello ha ji.
Executive: Hum se baat kar raha hu India Mart se.
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: Ye aap bataoge kaun sa naam tumhara.
Customer: Mayank bhai chemical aur kya bhaiya.
Customer: Hmm tumhari kis se baat kaun madam se baat hui thi.
Executive: Wo naam to nahi pata hai mere ko kuch din pehle bhi madam se baat hui thi unhone bola tha.
Customer: Hain ticket raise kiya tha ticket raise kiya tha.
Executive: Kya ji?
Customer: Main keh raha hu ticket raise kiya tha matlab kis se shikayat ki thi matlab apne concern bataya tha photo ka.
Customer: Ha.
Customer: Concern unhone tabhi ki mera concern raise kiya tha unko issue nahi hui.
Executive: Madam madam se baat kari thi maine.
Customer: Madam ka naam aapko yaad hai?
Executive: Naam to nahi yaad unka par lekin un madam ne bataya tha ki usme photo pe jaise click karenge to usme niche feedback ka aur wo share us ka aise karke option aate hain.
Executive: To usme feedback pe google ko feedback dalo usme ki remove kar do.
Executive: Wo remove ho jayenge wo karke dekha maine.
Executive: Ye particularly ek ek image pe aise karke dekha maine par aisa hua nahi.
Customer: Wahi photo wahi to show kar rahe hain jo neele drum rakhe hain char photo.
Executive: Ha ha ha.
Customer: Ek minute ruko main khol raha hu.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Jaise usko kholta hu to ye seedha tumko India Mart ke page pe le jata hai main bhai chemical se hai na agar wo photo show nahi kar wo photo agar all me jaoge na to photo show nahi karte agar images me jaoge.
Executive: Ha.
Executive: Ha to photo show kar rahi hai.
Executive: Ha images me hi to kar rahi hai aur kiski pe kar rahi hai ki.
Customer: Copy copy right body copy.
Customer: Tum tumne fir jo madam ne bola tha wo tumne kiya tha.
Executive: Ha wo sab karke dekha maine isliye to maine aaj concern uthaya dobara.
Customer: Achcha ek second ruko main dekhu kya diya hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Photo niche learn more ka option aata hai waha click karke click kar to pata body se copyright.
Customer: Mis type number kar submit copyright.
Customer: Can I use content from a work set protected by copyright.
Executive: Wo maine do tarah ki email se aur wo karke dekha hai ye.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Dono tarah ki email se karke dekh liya jo company me lag rahi hai us wali email se bhi karke dekh liya maine feedback aur apni email se bhi karke dekh liya feedback dono aise kuch nahi hua.
Customer: Achcha ye kya hai your content description of your work that.
Customer: La
Customer: Mayank bhai chemical.
Customer: Ye trade India me jo aa rahi tumhari Jasdan me aa rahi hai wo.
Executive: Jasdan ho inme aa hi nahi rahi ye wali photo.
Customer: Mayank bhai chemical Jasdan ye tumhara jo hoarding aur bahar ka jo wo hai version.
Executive: Hoarding ka hi aa raha hai wo wala photo nahi aa raha hai isme.
Executive: Inventory matlab main tumko wahi photo char hatwa na jisme ye neele container dikh rahe neele wale.
Executive: Ha ha ha.
Customer: Ek do teen teen ha teen aur char photo hai yo.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Theek hai do type bejh mar do usme.
Customer: Main khud yaha se kar dekh raha hu ek bar legal nahi nahi aise hi kar de.
Executive: Dekh aise hi ho jayega ha hello.
Customer: Hmm main yaha se ek bar main khud feedback de raha hu.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Ek second ruko India full legal main bhai chemical tumhara naam kya hai?
Executive: Mayank.
Customer: Company me Mayank bhai chemical na.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Company me Mayank bhai chemical.
Executive: Ha ha.
Customer: Main wo to company aur ye to full legal right se.
Customer: Court of content you are court wrong knowledge driving.
Customer: Kar kar you the content.
Customer: Remove this photo.

Executive: URL tumne URL copy karke dala tha kya?
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: URL copy karke dala tha uska.
Executive: Maine uska screenshot leke bhi dala hai usme feedback me.
Executive: Aur waise normal bhi dal ke dekh liya teen tarike se maine dal ke dekh liya.
Customer: Achcha ruko ek bar.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Kar do report bhai.


Customer: About this.


Customer: Dekho maine idhar se feedback de diya.
Executive: Theek hai hello ab wo saaf kar lo ek paanch kilo ki makki me.
Customer: Usme ye dal do.

Customer: Are ye batao jo Mayank bhai chemical ye mug wali aa rahi hai keval do mug hai ye bhi hatani hai.
Executive: Kya?
Customer: Ye keval do mug nahi aa rahe jisme liquid hai kuch.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Wo bhi hatani hai.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Mug wali bhi hatani hai nahi nahi nahi hai mug wali nahi hai inventory wali hai wo.
Executive: Bas jisme neele neele drum show ho rahe hain.
Executive: Ha jisme neele drum aur wo sab show ho rahe hain main charo report mar raha hu dekho.
Executive: Ha wo char photo jo bataye wo hatwani hai.

Customer: Teen charo report mare de raha hu yaha se.
Executive: Hmm.

Customer: Waise agar ye India Mart kuch hota to main kar pata ye google ka hai google me kitna time lagega time to nahi pata par main yaha se report mar ke de raha hu charo paancho photo me.
Executive: Ha report mar do.

Customer: Do char bar marna padega khatam ho jayega kyuki jab google pe response hamesha galat jayega na.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Dekho ek alag alag id se mar ke dekho kya pata jaldi ho jaye.
Customer: Ha main.

Customer: Mayank bhai chemical.
Customer: Chalo baat baki main tumko bhi 10 minute fir call check kar raha hu hai na.
Executive: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to remove photos with blue drums.

- Wants to remove mug photos from IndiaMART listing.



Resolution:

- Executive asked if customer submitted copyright claim.

- Executive asked customer to report the photos.

- Customer reported the photos.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back in 10 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- photos, remove, report, feedback, listing
